reviewText:
It's a shame this title/publisher went out print/business.  This story is full of the classic archetypes that enrich all epic tales of heroism and adventure and unfinished as it is, is still worth diving into.

The DVD format that this comic is presented in is a little hard to navigate on a mac, but still preserves enough of the story to be enjoyable.
I love Crossgen Digital Comics.  It's a new thing for me, but it's left me wanting more.

If you like the CrossGen comics, youll like these DVDs. It shows the pictures from the comic books with voice overs and it has some extras. I took one star off because, I would like to seem them make it into an actual cartoon with moving pictures and all, but its still good.
